altTitles.en: Precarious Female Executive Miss Black General
Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

altTitles.ja: 残念女幹部ブラックジェネラルさん

altTitles.es-la: La Precaria Mujer Ejecutiva Señorita General Black

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.es-la: La General Black es la líder de una organización secreta que quiere dominar al mundo. Por desgracia también esta loca por Braveman un superhéroe dedicado a frustrar los malvados planes de esta organización. Entonces, ¿Cómo exactamente va a conquistar el mundo cuando ni siquiera puede conquistar sus propios sentimientos? ¿Y cómo va a responder Braveman a este extraño giro?
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

altTitles.ja: BORUTO-ボルト- -NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS-

description.en:
Naruto was a young shinobi with an incorrigible knack for mischief. He achieved his dream to become the greatest ninja in the village and his face sits atop the Hokage monument. But this is not his story… A new generation of ninja are ready to take the stage, led by Naruto's own son, Boruto!

---

**Notes:**
- Includes the one-shot "Naruto: The Path Lit by the Full Moon".
description.pt: Continuação direta de Naruto. O mangá terá foco no filho de Naruto e Hinata, Boruto (Bolt), em Sarada, a filha de Sasuke e Sakura e na nova geração de ninjas após a 4° Grande Guerra Ninja.
description.ru: Cерия манги за совместным авторством Кодачи Укьё и Икемото Микио в жанре сёнэн, пришедшая на смену "Наруто".
description.pt-br: Continuação direta de Naruto. O mangá terá foco no filho de Naruto e Hinata, Boruto, e Sarada, a filha de Sasuke e Sakura e na nova geração de ninjas após a 4° Grande Guerra Ninja.

description.en:
Duan Fei reborn 20 years ago, a few hours before the Apocalypse, and he can finally make up for something he's regretted for 20 years...

He uses the knowledge he learned in his previous life to arm himself in this life and constantly improve his strength. Duan Fei, who can only survive in the last days, is a world hero in this life...
description.pt-br: Depois que Duan Fei morreu em sua vida anterior, ele renasceu e voltou há 20 anos, algumas horas antes de ser infectado pelo vírus. O arrependimento de Duan Fei por aqueles 20 anos pode finalmente ser remediado usando seus 20 anos de conhecimento de sua vida anterior para se armar no mundo presente. Duan Fei, que obteve a "árvore evolutiva", está constantemente melhorando sua força. Embora ele tenha sido o único sobrevivente na vida anterior, agora ele é um herói mundial nesta vida…

altTitles.ja: 殺しと噓のマリアージュ

description.en: From the fearsome tag team of Kawamoto Homura (Kakegurui) and Nadai Nishi (Satsudou) comes the cutest serial killer heroine ever?! A romantic thriller where exposing the lie means instant death!

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They Are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

title.en: Master: This Villainous Disciple Is Not The Holy Child

altTitles.zh: 师尊：这个冲师逆徒才不是圣子

altTitles.zh-ro: Shi Zun: Zhege Chong Shi Nitu Cai Bushi Sheng Zi
Shī Zūn: Zhège Chōng Shī Nìtú Cái Bùshì Shèng Zǐ

altTitles.es-la: Maestra, este Discípulo Villano no puede ser el Hijo Sagrado
Este Discípulo Tan rebelde No Puede Ser un Discípulo Santo

description.en: A hundred years ago, Chu Xiu transmigrated from Earth to Cang Qiong Continent, and received the Destined Villain System. After killing countless holy sons and daughters, he was surrounded by the older generation, and self destructed, possessing Tai Su Sacred Ground Yun Xia Mountain’s senior disciple. This time, he decided to lay low and develop strength. Let’s start small, what about becoming a saint admired by thousands?
description.zh: 蓝星来的楚休百年前穿越到天穹大陆，绑定天命反派系统，斩圣地圣子生女无数，杀到同辈之中无敌。 最终，被老一辈强者围杀，自爆而亡，夺舍太素圣地云霞峰大弟子重生。 这一次，他决定“苟”起来，偷偷发育。 先定个小目标，成为一位万人敬仰的圣子如何？
description.es-la: Chu Xiu de la Estrella Azul viajó al Continente Celestial de hace cien años, atado al Sistema de Villanos del Destino Celestial, decapitó a innumerables discípulos y discípulas santos de la Tierra Sagrada y matando hasta el punto de ser invencible entre sus iguales. Al final, se vio rodeado por la vieja generación de personas poderosos, que lo terminó haciendo morir y renacer como el discípulo mayor del Pico Yunxia de la Tierra Sagrada de Taisu. Esta vez, decidió ser mas «perro» y desarrollarse en secreto. Primero se fijó un pequeño objetivo, «¿qué tal convertirse en un hijo santo admirado por millones de personas?»

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1 - Phantom Blood

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 1: Sângele Trecutului

altTitles.it: JoJo e a sua Aventura Bizarra: Phantom Blood

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Phantom Blood

altTitles.th: Jojoล่าข้ามศตวรรษ

altTitles.es: La Extraña Aventura de JoJo: Sangre Fantasmal

altTitles.fr: Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: Phantom Blood

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ファントムブラッド

altTitles.pt-br: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure - Parte 1: Phantom Blood

description.en:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)

altTitles.ja: バーサス

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

title.en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei - Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei

altTitles.ja: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜

description.en:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.
A heart-throbbing coming-of-age love story!
description.pt-br:
"Eu quero tanto uma namorada que me contentaria com qualquer uma a esta altura." 
"Sério? Qualquer uma? Até mesmo eu?" 

Kaho, que nunca teve um namorado antes, queria entrar em um relacionamento entre um homem e mulher.
Takumi, que queria uma namorada, por acaso estava falando sobre isso na frente dela. Uma história de amor emocionante sobre amadurecimento!

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

description.en:
This is the proper traditional fantasy!

A growth-type hero series that fills your heart as you read, for the webtoon readers who are fed up with obvious overpowered MC series.

Our MC Leon decides that he will overcome his rival Leon, who stood at the top of the Royal Academy, with only hard work and sheer willpower. He hits a wall that cannot be overcome with training alone and fell into despair, only to get chosen by the Holy Sword Elcid that was fated to go to his rival, Leon. With the Holy Sword Elcid that fell and chose MC Leon as the Hero candidate because of his righteousness, Leon receives harsh training and finally clutches victory from the seemingly impossible duel with his rival! Having attained the qualification to be the owner of the Holy Sword, MC Leon begins his adventure to leave the Royal Academy and become the hero who saves the world…
description.ko:
이것이 바로 정통 판타지다! 
뻔한 먼치킨물에 식상한 웹툰 독자들을 위한 성장형 용사물로 볼수록 가슴이 웅장해지는 감동을 안겨주는 작품. 

주인공 레온은 오직 노력과 근성으로 같은 왕립아카데미의 정점에 서있는 라이벌 리안을 넘어서고자 한다. 하지만 도저히 자신의 수련만으론 넘을 수 없는 벽이 있음을 실감하고 좌절하던 중, 리안에게 갈 운명이었던 성검 엘시드의 선택을 받게 된다. 레온의 올곧음에 반해 그를 용사 후보로 선택한 성검 엘시드에게 레온은 혹독한 수련을 받게 되고, 마침내 불가능할 것 같았던 리안과의 대결에서 승리를 거머쥐게 된다! 이제 성검의 주인 자격을 얻은 레온은 왕립아카데미를 떠나 세상을 구하는 영웅이 되기 위한 모험을 시작하는데…
description.pt-br: O protagonista de uma história é sempre decidido desde o início. Não importa o quanto o papel coadjuvante tente, eles serão apenas um papel coadjuvante no final. Então, chegou um momento em que tudo isso mudou. [Leon, você acha que é qualificado?] A espada sagrada que deveria escolher o herói do oráculo veio até ele. O que? Você não tem talento, pobre, e não tem conexões? Não se preocupe! O herói que pode resolver qualquer coisa com a espada sagrada está aqui! “… Houve um período em que eu pensei assim também. É aqui que começa a história de Leon como o herói.

title.en: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete

altTitles.ja: 仕事帰り、独身の美人上司に頼まれて

altTitles.en: On My Way Home from Work, My Beautiful Single Boss Asked Me to Do Something for Her
On my way home from work, my beautiful single boss asked me to do something for her.

description.en:
One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.

“We have nothing to do with anything else… We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby.

The loveless relationship between the two had begun. Although the condition was not to fall in love with each other, the distance between the two gradually narrowed.

The romance story between a typical worker and a divorced female boss. It has officially begun.
description.ja:
「お願い……。私のこと、抱いてほしい」
若手社員の実沢春彦は、会社で『女帝』と恐れられる厳格な上司・桃生結子から、飲み会帰りホテルへと誘われた。戸惑う実沢に、彼女は恥じらいながらお願いする――。

「私と……子作りだけしてくれないかしら？」

誰にも言えない、恋愛なしの男女の関係が始まる。女上司が俺にだけ見せる顔。好きになってはならないルール。
それなのに俺達は徐々に惹かれ合い――。美人上司と部下、禁断と背徳の大人ラブコメ開幕！

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/unfins)  
- [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/unfins)

title.en: The Story of How the Girl of My Dreams Was a Stalker

altTitles.ja: 憧れのあの子がストーカーだった話

altTitles.ja-ro: Akogareno ano ko ga sutōkādatta hanashi

altTitles.es-la: La historia de cómo la chica de mis sueños era una acosadora

description.en:
The story of how the girl of my dreams was a stalker.

Manga by Twitter user @ku-sunok1
description.es-la: Manga del usuario de Twitter @ku_sunok1, el título es también sinopsis.

altTitles.ja-ro: Anata ga Watashi wo Terasu kara.

altTitles.ja: あなたが私を照らすから。

description.en:
Kanomata Akie's dream is to fall in love, so she enrolls at Sakuraba Academy, a high school famous for its couples' festival, to make her dream a reality. Then, on her very first day, under the falling cherry blossoms, her springtime begins.

A comedy about two girls who try to win the couples' festival and become their school's top couple!

title.en: Watashi Yori Tsuyoi Otoko to Kekkon Shitai no

altTitles.ja: 私より強い男と結婚したいの

altTitles.en: I Want to Marry a Man Stronger Than Me!

description.en: Akira Kogure, an introverted loner high-school student befriends the student council president Shizuka Takasaki, who excels in both academics and athletics, blessed with beautiful looks from birth. Though their relationship may seem to be normal, both are keeping a secret that they can't reveal to anyone?!

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

altTitles.en: Escape the Dungeon Is So Hard

altTitles.es-la: Escapar de una mazmorra es muy difícil

description.en:
Go Insung did not pass onto hell or heaven after suddenly dying, but instead onto a dungeon. A place in between the afterlife and the world.

And it’s no normal dungeon, but one with a system.

While being watched by the numerous dead of the afterlife, Go Insung has to clear the dungeon with the other challengers in order to escape.

title.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten: After the Rain

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais: After the Rain

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.

title.en: The Return of Elena the Knight

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại của Nữ Hiệp Sĩ

description.en:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
description.id: Elena, yang menghabiskan seluruh hidupnya sebagai seorang ksatria wanita berdarah dingin untuk membalaskan dendam keluarganya, akhirnya mati tanpa menuntut balas. Ketika dia membuka matanya, dia menemukan bahwa dia kembali ke masa lalu. Pada siang hari dia menjadi seorang wanita bangsawan, dan pada malam hari dia membawa pedang untuk mengubah sejarah dan mencegah kehancuran keluarganya. "Saya ingin menikahi Anda, Yang Mulia," katanya kepada putra mahkota. Dia akan melakukan ini untuk menyelamatkan keluarganya.

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Yuusha wa, Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita Genjitsu Sekai de, Influencer natte Kane wo Kasegimasu!

altTitles.en: The hero returns from another world, becomes an influencer, and earns money in the real world, where dungeons have appeared!

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの勇者は、ダンジョンが出現した現実世界で、インフルエンサーになって金を稼ぎます！

description.en:
One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new “dungeon” has appeared.

A modern dungeon fantasy where the former hero becomes a warrior, delving into dungeons created in his own world!
description.ja:
普通の高校生が、ある日異世界へ転移することになった。
向こうの世界でレベルを上げ、無事魔王を倒し、世界を救うことに成功！
その最強ステータスのまま現実社会に帰還することに。

すると、帰還先の現実世界でも、新しく『ダンジョン』が出現していて――。

元勇者が現実世界にできたダンジョンを配信しながら無双する、現代ダンジョンファンタジー！！
description.es-la: Un día, un estudiante de secundaria normal y corriente es llevado a otro mundo. Sube su nivel en el otro mundo, derrota con éxito al Rey Demonio y salva el mundo. Con su nivel más fuerte, decide volver a su mundo. Sin embargo, en el mundo al que regresa, ha aparecido también una nueva "mazmorra". Una moderna fantasía de mazmorras en la que el antiguo héroe se convierte en un guerrero, ¡que se adentra en las mazmorras creadas en su propio mundo!

altTitles.th: ยุคแห่งยอดมนุษย์

altTitles.ja: 超人の時代

description.en:
Unknown monsters have appeared on Earth, alongside ‘Superhumans’ who appear to dispatch them. With these mysterious monsters and superhumans, a new ‘Superhuman Era’ begins!  

---

Jika memang ada 'Manusia Super' di dunia ini, Apakah kalian akan percaya dengan hal tersebut? Tiap monster-monster muncul, seorang siswa yang seperti pelajar pada umumnya, memiliki kekuatan super yang dapat menghabisi monster-monster ini. Tetapi.. siapa sebenarnya siswa ini? Dan darimana asalnya monster-monster yang bermunculan ini?

地球に出現した正体不明の怪物たち…。そしてその怪物たちを制圧する超人が登場する！怪物VS超人、まさに「超人の時代」の到来！

description.ko:
지구에 근원 모를 괴물들이 출현하고
그들을 제압하는 '초인'들 또한 등장한다.

description.ru: Если бы кто-то сказал, что «Супермен» действительно существует в этом мире, вы бы поверили? Каждый раз, когда появляется монстр, студент, или, по крайней мере, выглядит как учащийся, обладающий сверхспособностями, - убивает чудище. Но... кто именно этот герой? И откуда появились эти "другие"?
description.th:
จู่ ๆ โลกของเราก็มีมอนสเตอร์กำเนิดขึ้น ไม่มีใครรู้ว่าพวกมันมาจากไหน แต่การปรากฏของพวกมันมาพร้อมกับพลังเหนือมนุษย์ในผู้คนเช่นกัน มนุษย์เหล่านั้นจึงใช้พลังปกป้องโลกเพื่อสร้างสันติสุข ...ใช่แล้ว นี่คือเรื่องราวของ "ยุคแห่งยอดมนุษย์" นั่นเอง

description.zh:
紧急警报！怪物肆虐！
硬核少年超人拯救人类！
男主林江平时在学校里只是一个普通的学生，但这个看似平凡的男孩却肩负着重大的责任——拯救地球！因为他是一个拥有超能力的“超人”。林江和他的搭档们能否成功抵御异人种的威胁？地球又会面临怎样的命运?一场惊险刺激的地球守卫战即将上演！

description.zh-hk:
地球上出現了不知從哪冒出來的怪物，為了擊滅這些怪物，「超人」出現了。來路不明的怪物和超人，正好締造出了「超人時代」。

description.en: The Age of Adventures that started when the Gates opened. The Age of when everything fell apart, filled with desperation, anguish, and misery. And… The Age of when everyone gave up trying to fight back. In that Age, there was only one Explorer who fought to the very end. “You’re the only one left. The Last Explorer, Elpam.” In that moment, the Explorer’s history came to an end, as he returned to the start of the story.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.es-la: El Troll más fuerte del mundo

description.en:
Arcadia.
The game that holds the most possibilities in the world.
Humanity’s first virtual reality game, made from the cooperation between the world’s leading companies:
Ajin Electronics. Sillicoff Industries. Argos Corporation.
The shocking stories that happen within the game begin now!

[Welcome to Arcadia, the world of fantasy.]

altTitles.ja: 快傑ライオン丸

description.en: During the Warring States period, the demon king Gosun, who has been hiding in the Himalayas for a hundred years and has mastered evil sorcery, is aiming to conquer Japan. Shishimaru fights as the invincible ninja Kaikitsu Lionmaru with the sword given to him by Koji Kashin, Japan's greatest ninja!

altTitles.ja: ラジエーションハウス

description.en: A new milestone in medical drama begins! A medical diagnosis mystery manga depicting the other side of medical care, the radiology department. Iori Igarashi is a talented radiology technician who has patiently waited for his chance to work with An Amakasu, his childhood friend. After being hired at her family's hospital, he is determined to fulfill a promise that he made with An when they were younger. Unfortunately, having been out of touch for years, she doesn't recognize him and it doesn't help that she also isn't a fan of the way he performs his duties. As all sorts of cases come into the department, she must acknowledge his skills and learn to work together so that patients can receive the best treatment possible. While the two of them adapt to each other, will An recognize her childhood friend, who has been working with her all this time?
description.es-la: ¡Resulta que no solo el médico general diagnostica nuestras enfermedades! Hay médicos radiógrafos que investigan las causas y revelan las lesiones mediante rayos X o tomografía computarizada. Por no hablar de los radiólogos, que interpretan los escáneres y hacen los diagnósticos. Este 'diagnóstico de imagen' forma la base de la medicina moderna. Desde un lado del hospital que antes no se veía, donde los expertos combaten las enfermedades y las lesiones, te traemos 'Radiation House'. ¡Comienza un nuevo hito en el drama médico!

altTitles.en: Limited Time of the Terminally-Ill Extra

altTitles.it: Il tempo dei malati terminali extra

altTitles.th: ชีวิตที่เหลือของตัวประกอบจำกัดเวลา

altTitles.ja: 余命わずかの脇役令嬢

altTitles.vi: Thời Gian Của Nhân Vật Phụ Có Giới Hạn

altTitles.en: The Time of the Terminally-Ill Extra

altTitles.es-la: El Tiempo Adicional De La Enferma Terminal

description.en:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

description.id:
Sebagai anak kedua, Karina menghabiskan hidupnya selalu mengalah pada kakak-adiknya. Suatu hari, dia diberitahu bahwa menggambar yang merupakan hobinya, membuat sisa hidupnya hanya tinggal satu tahun lagi. Tak ingin terus hidup tidak dianggap oleh keluarganya, dia memutuskan untuk pergi dari rumah. Dengan persiapan seadanya, dia pergi ke tempat tunangan yang tidak begitu dia kenal untuk menghabiskan sisa hidupnya.

description.it:
Come figlia di mezzo che non è né l'erede né gli amati gemelli più piccoli, Karina ha vissuto tutta la sua vita nascosta agli altri. Lei, che aveva un solo hobby della pittura, ha scoperto che le restava solo 1 anno di vita. Quindi senza un piano, è andata a trovare il suo fidanzato che conosceva a malapena... Per annullare il fidanzamento come aveva sempre voluto.

"Non voglio tergiversare. Voglio passare un anno qui."

"...Mia Signora, sei impazzita?"

"In cambio, accetterò di annullare il fidanzamento."

Ma allora non lo sapeva. Che avrebbe ricevuto l'amore incondizionato che non aveva mai ricevuto per tutta la vita da lui, e che sarebbe arrivata ad avere un desiderio per vivere la sua vita un tempo priva di significato.

description.ja:
家門の跡を継ぐ長子でも、家族の愛を独占できる末っ子でもない、中途半端な2番目として、いつも誰かの影で生きてきたカリナ。 絵を描くことが唯一の趣味だった彼女は、自分に残された時間があと少しだということを知り、今まで交流もなかった婚約者に会いに行くことに。 婚約破棄の書類を胸に抱いて… 「ここにいさせてください」 「正気か？」 「その代わり…婚約を破棄して差し上げます」 この時は思いもしなかった。あれほど望んだ無償の愛と関心を彼がくれることになるなんて。 そのせいで、どうでもよかった人生に未練を抱くことになるなんて…

description.ko:
가문의 후계자도, 귀여움을 독차지하는 막내도 되지 못한 어중간한 둘째로,
평생 다른 사람들에게 가려진 삶을 살아온 카리나. 
그림을 그리는 것만이 유일한 취미인 그녀는
자신에게 남은 시간이 고작 1년 뿐이라는 사실을 알게 된다. 

그래서 교류도 없던 약혼자를 무작정 찾아갔다.
그가 원하던 파혼 서류를 품에 고이 간직한 채.

"단도직입적으로 말하자면, 여기서 1년간 지내고 싶어요."
"......미쳤나, 영애?" 
“대신 파혼해 드릴게요.”

하지만 그땐 미처 알지 못했다. 
평생 가지지 못했던 대가 없는 관심과 애정을 그에게 받게 될 줄은.
그래서 미련 없던 삶에 이토록 욕심이 생기게 될 줄은.

description.ru:
Карина всю жизнь находилась в чужой тени. Абсолютно обычная, ни наследница рода, ни милашка, как ее младшие – близняшки. Однажды она узнает, что ей остался всего год. Поэтому она тут же помчалась к своему жениху, неся с собой заявление на расторжение брака, о котором ее жених, должно быть, так грезил.— Скажу прямо, я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи, вы с ума сошли?..— За это я дам вам развод.Вот только кое-чего она не знала.— Похоже, вы продолжаете делать вид, будто не замечаете, поэтому мне придется это сказать.— Скажите.— Вы мне нравитесь.Она никогда даже надеяться не смела, что просто так получит его расположение. Поэтому она и не думала, что у нее появится настолько сильное желание в жизни, к которой она не была готова.

description.uk:
Вона не була спадкоємицею сім'ї, або навіть милою і обожнюваною молодшою дитиною, але неоднозначною середньою дитиною, Карина, та, яка завжди буде затьмарювати інших. Дівчина, чиє єдине хобі полягало в тому, щоб малювати, дізналася, що їй залишилося жити всього один рік.
Так, вона раптом пішла в гості до свого нареченого, з яким у неї ніколи не було ніяких взаємодій. У її руках були документи, необхідні для анулювання їх заручин, так само, як він хотів.

"Чесно кажучи, я хочу жити тут один рік."
"...Ти збожеволіла, молода міс?"
"В обмін на це я розірву заручини."

Однак тоді вона не знала, що отримає всю увагу і прихильність, яку не отримувала все своє життя.

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

altTitles.ja: 水のともだちカッパーマン

description.en: Kawataro, half human, half kappa, lives as a human, because his father, a kappa, wished so. Kawataro travels to find his mother who disappeared when he was young. On his trip, he encounters various youkai.

altTitles.ja: 一勝千金

description.en:
“Yup! Just as slow as I thought.”

After retiring from public fighting and getting fired from underground fighting, 27 year old Tenma Nozomi's zest for life is gradually dwindling away. It's hard to be at the bottom with nowhere to go, and that's exactly where she and her two friends are. However, Nozomi hits upon an idea that may just solve all of their problems: they could make their own underground fighting circuit for women, and tap into an underexplored market. As good as that sounds, her insistence on including the unknown quantity Hongou Hina may prove to be more than she bargained for...

altTitles.ja: オシバナ！

description.en: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
description.ja: 「学園の王子様」なヒロインを巡って少年少女がせめぎ合う一触即発ラブコメディ

altTitles.es-la: El sucesor de los héroes mitologicos

description.en:
Han Jungmin, who is only ‘top on in written exams’, gave up becoming an adventurer as he didn’t have the talent.
After taking some time off from the adventurer academy, and as he started to write a fantasy novel…
[You have been plagiarised by the world.]
[Unique class – author of the story starts.]
one day, the novel Jungmin wrote starts to become a reality and gets the job of being the ‘author of the story’.
On top of that… [The only unique ability opens.] a special skill that nobody else has.
Can Jungmin achieve his dream of becoming a dungeon adventurer?
description.pt-br:
Han Jungmin, que ficou em primeiro lugar no teste teórico, desistiu de se tornar um aventureiro, por não ter talento. Depois de um tempo fora da Escola de Aventureiros, ele começou a escrever uma novel de fantasia...

[Você foi plagiado pelo Mundo.]

[Classe Única - Autor da História (Único).] 

Um dia, a novel de Jugmin começou a se tornar realidade. Além disso... [Uma habilidade única foi desbloqueada.], uma habilidade especial que ninguém tinha surgiu. Será que Jungmin poderá realizar o seu sonho de se tornar um aventureiro de dungeon?

title.en: Tonari no Kuderella o Amayakashitara, Uchi no Aikagi o Watasu Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: I Spoiled "Kuderella" Next Door and I'm Going to Give Her a Key to My House

altTitles.ja: 隣のクーデレラを甘やかしたら、ウチの合鍵を渡すことになった

description.en:
A sweet cross-cultural romantic comedy tale about a beautiful exchange student from a foreign country, and the young man who takes care of her dinner. Katagiri Naomi, a high school student who lived alone for two years, meets a beautiful girl with black hair and blue eyes, who moves into the apartment next door. The girl's name is Yui. It seemed that she really was a noblewoman, and her nickname was “Quderella” because of her nonchalant attitude at school. Naomi knows that Yui doesn't want to depend on others, but she's actually quite naive, so Naomi decides to help her.

"Today what are we having at night... Karaage chicken, huh?"
"That's right because the price of chicken is discounted today"
“I love your fried chicken so I'm really looking forward to it”
description.id:
Kisah komedi romantis lintas budaya yang manis tentang seorang pertukaran pelajaran dari negara asing yang cantik, dan pemuda yang mengurus makan malamnya.
Katagiri Natsuomi, seorang siswa SMA yang tinggal sendiri selama dua tahun, mendapati seorang gadis cantik berambut hitam, bermata biru, yang pindah ke apartemen sebelah tempatnya. Gadis itu bernama Yui. Tampkanya dia benar-benar seorang wanita bangsawan, dan julukannya adalah “Coup de Lera” karena sikap acuh tak acuhnya di sekolah. Natsuomi mengetahui bahwa Yui tidak mau bergantung pada orang lain, tapi sebenarnya dia cukup naif, sehingga Natsuomi memutuskan untuk membantunya.
“Hari ini kita malan malam apa… Ayam goreng, ‘kah?”
“Benar, soalnya harga ayam sedang diskon hari ini”
“Aku suka ayam goreng buatanmu, jadi aku sangat menantikannya”

Ini adalah awal dari hubungan manis dan menggiurkan di antara gadis dan pemuda yang tinggal bersebelahan.
description.ja:
一人暮らしの男子高校生・夏臣の隣室に黒髪碧眼の美少女が引っ越してきた。その少女、ユイは学校での塩対応から「クーデレラ」と呼ばれるようになるが、夏臣の前でだけは無防備な姿を見せてきて…！？

---

Hitorigurashi no danshi kōkōsei natsu shin no rinshitsu ni kurokami hekigan no bishōjo ga hikkoshite kita. Sono shōjo, Yui wa gakkō de no shio taiō kara "kūderera" to yoba reru yō ni naruga, natsu shin no mae de dake wa mubōbina sugata o misete kite…!?

description.en:
Not all job classes are created equal!

Marnac was pulled into a game while trying to play as one of its worst job classes, Cleric of Decay. Now he’s the only cleric of the Order of Decay, serving a goddess who’s been reduced to an animated hand that repeats the word “MURDER!”

Will the Order’s last cleric become powerful enough before the prophecy of “the end” comes true?

altTitles.ja: しあわせゴハン

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

altTitles.ja: ジュラシック学園

description.en: Love blooms at a Jurassic Academy.

title.en: The Knight King Who Returned with a God

altTitles.es-la: El Rey Caballero que regresó con un Dios

description.en:
I returned to Earth after hunting demons in the otherworld for three hundred years. However, I did not return alone.

**Official Translations**
[Simplified Chinese](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/yushentongguideqishiwang/list?title_no=2594) 
[Traditional Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-king-of-knights-returns-with-god/list?title_no=5491)

altTitles.ja: 僕の呪いの吸血姫

description.en: In Japan, vampires have emerged and are rampaging throughout the country, eating and killing humans. In order to protect his friends, Isuzu, the leader of the anti-vampire security force, plans to kidnap the vampire slayer " Baroque," who is unofficially detained by the government. She is a legendary "vampire" that drives those who see her crazy with her sheer beauty.
description.ja: 人間を喰い殺す「吸血鬼」が出現し、猛威を振るうようになった日本。特殊部隊の隊長・緒坂唯鈴は、吸血鬼から仲間を守りたい一心で国が非公式に拘束しているという「吸血鬼バロック」の誘拐を計画。あまりの美しさゆえ、見た者を狂い死なせるという伝説の「吸血鬼殺し」バロック。自らの立場も命も投げうち、彼女に協力を求める唯鈴にバロックは――。

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: 相席いいですか？

description.en:
Tsubaki is a working woman who struggles with her relationship with her subordinate. Momoko is a university student struggling with her part-time job. Two people of different ages and backgrounds happen to be sitting together...?

A breath of fresh air. A relaxing lunchtime comedy.

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

altTitles.fr: My Love Story With Yamada-Kun at LVL 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

title.en: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.

altTitles.ja: 俺以外誰も採取できない素材なのに「素材採取率が低い」とパワハラする幼馴染錬金術師と絶縁した専属魔導士、辺境の町でスローライフを送りたい。

altTitles.en: The Assistant Mage Parts Ways With His Power Abusive Alchemist Childhood Friend and His Being Told to Have "Low Chance of Gathering Materials," and Wants to Start a Slow Life at a Town in the Remote Region
Only I Can Collect These Materials! ~ An Assistant Mage Who Broke up With His Alchemist Girlfriend After Her Harassment Wants to Lead a Slow Life in a Remote Town

altTitles.id: Padahal Hanya Aku yang Dapat Mengumpulkan Material Itu, tapi Aku Dikatai "Tingkat Pengumpulan Materialmu Ampas" sama Teman Semasa Kecilku yang Menjadi Alkemis, Aku pun Pensiun Menjadi Asisten Penyihirnya dan Memulai Hidup Baru yang Santai di Kota Terpencil.

description.en:
The Assistant Mage of the genius alchemist Ruby—Lloyd has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. 

Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. 

However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather.

The mage, who was treated as “incompetent” and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easy going life!
description.id: Asisten Penyihir, Lloyd, mempunyai kemampuan mengumpulkan material untuk alkemis yang rendah daripada orang lain yang membuat Alkemis yang menggangdengnya, Ruby, terus-terusan memarahi Lloyd yang dimatanya tidak pernah benar. Suatu hari dia muak dengan perlakuan Ruby yang makin menjadi-jadi dan memutuskan untuk pensiun menjadi asisten penyihirnya. Lantas, akan ke mana Lloyd pergi?
description.ja:
天才錬金術師ルビーの専属魔導士ロイドは、錬金術で使う素材の採取率が異常に低いため、ルビーのお荷物扱いとして国中の笑いものになっていた。
ルビーからも毎日怒られる日々を過ごしていた彼だが、あまりにも絶望的なこの環境が嫌になりついに彼女との絶縁を決意する！
しかし、みんなは知らなかった……。ロイドの揃える素材は、ほかの誰にも集められないような貴重なモノばかりだということに……。

自他ともに「無能扱い」されていた魔導士が目指す、理想のスローライフ！

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Koto Nairan-hen

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Ancient City Insurrection Arc

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School -  Ancient City Insurrection Arc

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Волнение в Древней Столице

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 古都内乱編

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō Nama Koto Nairan-hen

description.en:
Zhou Gongjin, who was the mastermind of what happened in the Parasite Doll incident of Nine Schools Competition, has fled from Yokohama to the area of the original ancient magic users group centred around Kyoto also known as the *traditionalists*.   
Since then two months have passed and the National High School Magic Thesis Competition will soon be held again. This year's Thesis Competition is being held in Kyoto sponsored by the Magic Association and in their conference hall.   
Tatsuya gets visited by the Kuroba twins who as representatives bring Yotsuba Maya's letter to him. The letter is a request from his aunt saying "I hope for your cooperation to capture Zhou Gongjin".  
While it is questionable that whether it is a "command" rather than a "request", Tatsuya and Miyuki go to Kudou's house as they are in the centre as opponents of the traditionalists. As a result, the two siblings have a fated encounter with the "Genius Augmented Magician”.   
Conspiracy of the ancient city was the stage. The fate that has continued to smoulder away in the back of the history of magician development, Tatsuya and Miyuki and his companions are challenged.   
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 14-15.

title.en: The Return of the 8th Class Mage

altTitles.en: The Return of the 8th Class Magician

altTitles.it: Il ritorno del mago di VIII classe

altTitles.ja: 8クラス魔法使いのやり直し

altTitles.th: การกลับมาของจอมเวทระดับ 8

altTitles.es-la: El Retorno Del Mago De 8th Clase

description.en:
It’s been many years since I’ve bloodied my hands for the United Empire and its emperor, Ragnar. I wanted to return to my hometown and live a quiet life as if to repent for my sins. However–

“You are a great 8th class magician who is able to overthrow me and the empire at any time. How could I let a monster like you stay alive?”

After being betrayed on the verge of death by Ragnar, who was my friend as well as my Emperor, he stabbed my heart with a dagger that had time magic applied to it.

“The penance I want is to put everything back to its place.”

---
As a powerful 8th class mage, Ian Paige took countless innocent lives under the orders of Emperor Ragnar, a close friend and ruler of the Greenriver Empire. Yet despite their closeness, Ragnar views Ian as a threat and subsequently poisons him. Using time magic, Ian saves himself and returns 30 years to the past. Now a young boy, Ian joins an elite order of mages to hone his abilities once again. This time, he’ll get revenge on the emperor who betrayed him and reclaim glory as an 8th class mage!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/8%ED%81%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%8A%A4-%EB%A7%88%EB%B2%95%EC%82%AC%EC%9D%98-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2514), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57140255)

description.id:
Sudah bertahun-tahun sejak aku menodai tanganku untuk Kerajaan Bersatu dan kaisarnya, Ragnar. Saya ingin kembali ke kampung halaman saya dan menjalani kehidupan yang tenang seolah-olah bertobat dari dosa-dosaku. Namun, “Kamu adalah penyihir kelas 8 yang hebat yang mampu menggulingkanku dan kekaisaran kapan saja” "Bagaimana aku bisa membiarkan monster sepertimu tetap hidup?" Setelah dikhianati di ambang kematian oleh Ragnar, yang adalah temanku sekaligus Kaisarku, aku menusuk jantungku dengan belati yang memiliki sihir waktu yang diterapkan padanya. “Penebusan yang ku inginkan adalah mengembalikan semuanya ke tempatnya.”

---

description.it:
Dopo decine di anni passate in sanguinose guerre l'imperatore Ragnar incontra il suo vecchio amico, ritiratosi ad una vita di solitudine e esilio nella città natale, nell'intento di espiare i propri peccati. Ad un mago potente sarà concesso il lusso di ritirarsi in esilio? Con un tradimento ha fine una lunga amicizia. Però, prima che la morte sopraggiunga, esiste la possibilità di rimediare ad ogni peccato. Attraverso un balzo nel tempo di oltre 30 anni il potente mago cercherà di ribaltare le sorti del futuro.

---

description.ko:
황제 라그나르와 통일 제국을 위해 손에 피를 묻히길 수십 년.
나는 고향으로 돌아가 속죄하며 죽은 듯이 살고자 했다.

그러나,

“자네는 언제든지 나를, 나의 제국을 집어삼킬 수 있는 8클래스의 대마법사.”
“그런 괴물을 어찌 살려둘 수가 있겠나?”

친구이자 주군이었던 라그나르에게 배신당하고 죽음의 문턱을 넘기 직전,
시간 마법의 주문이 새겨진 단검을 심장에 찔러 넣었다.

‘내가 원했던 참회란, 모든 것을 되돌려놓는 것.’


인류 최초의 8클래스 마법사 이안 페이지.
그가 30년 전 과거로 돌아왔다.

description.ru:
История рассказывает об Иане Пэйдже, архимаге и первом человеке, который прорвался через уровень шестого класса, а затем и седьмого, став самым могущественным магом восьмого класса.

После целой жизни, состоящей из войн и убийств, он сумел окончательно объединить континент. Состарившись, единственными его желаниями стали стремление прожить остаток жизни в мире и попытки найти спасение от горестей, привнесённых пролитой им кровью. Тем не менее его старый друг, обезумев от паранойи, не мог спокойно сосуществовать рядом с кем-то настолько сильным и предал Иана, убив его.

На последнем издыхании Иан использовал магию времени, которая переместила его в прошлое, в то время, когда он был маленьким мальчиком. Имея при себе все свои знания из прошлого, Иан решил сделать нечто большее, чтобы просто прожить жизнь с меньшим количеством сожалений.

description.uk:
Багато років я проливав кров за Сполучену Імперію та її правителя, Рагнара. Я хотів лише повернутися в моє рідне місто і прожити тихе життя, спокутувати свої гріхи. «Як можу я залишити в живих такого монстра?» Відданий і залишений Рагнаром, моїм колишнім другом та імператором, вмирати, на порозі смерті я пронизав своє серце кинджалом, наповненим магією часу. «Бажане мною відкуплення – це повернення на своє звичне місце».

title.en: The Duke's Villainous Daughter Is Depressed

altTitles.en: The Melancholy of the Wicked Duke's Lady
The Melancholy of the Evil Duke's Young Lady

description.en: Irene Song had transmigrated inside a novel and became the villainous daughter of a duke. However, the duke, who was unaware of this fact, simply thought she had amnesia and sends her off to marry the second prince of Rennes Empire. Little did she know that the second prince was cursed by an evil wizard and turned him into a dog during the day and could only turn back to a human at night. What’s worse, she even named it “Tofu” after she found it wandering in the Imperial Palace. Who would have known it was her own husband!
